Dear Bernardina

I sent Casaca to write to you on my behalf from here, but I have decided to take him along.

Send me through Vicente 2 pieces of yellow cloth. Regards to all our people and hugs to our children. Rest assured, I am not going to Rio, and I will soon head to the Assembly; farewell, until soon.

Yours: (a) Almeida.
